reviews.text:
Good little station even when there’s only one line this train goes on so don’t expect an easy journey unless it’s to London Bridge.

The staff are nice and friendly who I would rather use then the machines outside.
Tidy station but only 1 per hour train service during the day to both London Bridge and Uckfield. Ticket office open in the morning and the station car park is £4.60 per day

Largely unmanned Station, ticket office open from about 06:30 to 12:30. Generally pretty quiet outside of commuting hours where it struggles to accommodate the large number of commuters taking advantage of the relatively cheap ticketing and little over the hour journey to London Bridge. 

Parking is expensive which means surrounding roads and car parks fill early in the morning with commuter cars as the owners catch the busiest 06:46 to 08:15 trains.
